name: Arizona Type Ratings
about: Arizona Type Ratings is a specialized flight training institution focused exclusively on the Cessna Citation family of business jets, including the CE-500, CE-510, and CJ 525 series. Our instructors are seasoned jet professionals and Cessna Citation experts with over 30 years of experience. We offer one-on-one training, either in your aircraft or ours, and at your preferred location. Our comprehensive programs include initial and recurrent type ratings, as well as additional courses such as differences training, high altitude endorsement, single pilot exemption training, upset recovery, and pinch hitter training. Our training includes ground school, flight simulator options, and practical checkrides to ensure pilots are fully equipped to operate these aircraft safely and efficiently. With thousands of students trained, Arizona Type Ratings is committed to providing exceptional expertise and customer service.
